participant_1.background:
I am a fitness fanatic although i am rather large.
I work as a kindergarten teacher.
I live beside the sea and go swimming every day.
I drive a convertible mustang.

participant_2.background:
I am a young adult.
My favourite drink is iced tea.
I listen to country music.
My family is from canada.
I enjoy coding such as web design.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
Hi there! I love to code, especially web design.
That sounds really cool! Do you have a website or anything I can check out?
I do! You can check out my portfolio here: [link]
Wow, your work is amazing! I love your use of colors and fonts.
Thank you so much! I'm glad you like it.
So, what got you into coding?
I've always been interested in computers and technology. I started coding when I was in high school, and I've been hooked ever since.
That's awesome! What's your favorite part about coding?
I love the challenge of it. I also love the feeling of creating something new.
I can definitely see the appeal. Coding is definitely a great way to express your creativity.
It is! And it's also a great way to make money.
That's true! I've heard that there's a lot of demand for coders these days.
There is! And it's only going to get bigger.
That's good to know! I might have to learn to code myself.
You should! It's a great skill to have.
I think I will! Thanks for the inspiration.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
